snippet.title: Recherche sans budget, Europe sans avenir Recherche sans budget, Europe sans avenir
snippet.description: Recherche sans budget, Europe sans avenir Recherche sans budget, Europe sans avenir / Staff Association Latest developments Negotiations in Brussels in early February 2013 to define the long-term budget 2014 − 2020 of the European Union (EU) could result in a significant loss for the European research program 2020. It could be that the research program of the EU would have to face a decrease from the already low 80 billion euros proposed by the Commission in late 2012 to 69 billion euros (a decrease of almost 12 % or even more considering that the European Parliament had initially proposed a budget of 100 billion euros for Horizon 2020) [...] BUL-SA-2013-025.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 08/2013 09/2013

snippet.title: Measuring Cultural Dynamics Through the Eurovision Song Contest
snippet.description: Measuring Cultural Dynamics Through the Eurovision Song Contest / García, David ; Tanase, Dorian Measuring culture and its dynamics through surveys has important limitations, but the emerging field of computational social science allows us to overcome them by analyzing large-scale datasets. [...] arXiv:1301.2995. \- 2013\. Preprint
